original_title: ‘Daddy’ Trump and Western Europe’s oath of allegiance — RT World News
article_summary: US imposes sanctions on ICC officials for pursuing cases against American soldiers and Israeli officials, with the ICC denouncing the move as an attack on its independence. Meanwhile, Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov indicates that Russian President Vladimir Putin is ready to meet Ukrainian President Vladimir Zelensky once all issues related to the conflict are worked out.</s>
